programme.desc: The 1890s: William Murdoch uses then-radical forensic techniques – including fingerprinting and trace evidence – to solve some of the city's most gruesome murders.

programme.title: Murdoch Mysteries (Murdoch Mysteries), Drama, Kriminalinis, Mistinis, Didžioji Britanija, 2017
programme.desc: The 1890s: William Murdoch uses then-radical forensic techniques – including fingerprinting and trace evidence – to solve some of the city's most gruesome murders.

programme.title: Miss Scarlet and the Duke (Miss Scarlet and the Duke), Kriminalinis, Drama, Didžioji Britanija, 2022
programme.desc: The 1850s: the fearless and inquisitive Miss Scarlet runs her late father's detective agency with the help of Inspector Wellington ('The Duke'), housekeeper Ivy, and savvy crook Moses.

programme.title: All Creatures Great and Small (All Creatures Great and Small), Drama, Didžioji Britanija, 2020
programme.desc: James Herriot follows his dream to become a vet in the Yorkshire Dales; he discovers that treating the animals is as much about treating their owners – and the farmers are a tough crowd to please.

programme.title: Copper (Copper), Veiksmo, Drama, JAV, 2012
programme.desc: New York City is on the brink of Lincoln's assassination. Crime thrives in its tough Irish neighborhood, even with power player General Brendan Donovan at the helm of the local police.

programme.title: Strike Force (Force), Veiksmo, Kriminalinis, Drama, 2015
programme.desc: On his first work day in Amsterdam, Willem (Dennis van de Ven) and his new partner Sam (Karien Noordhoff) interrogate a drugged prostitute named Roxy (Lisa Zweerman). Meanwhile, Theo (Jeroen van Koningsbrugge) and Maartje (Kiki van Deursen) develop a plan to lure hitman Achmatov (Marcel Zwoferink) out of hiding.

programme.title: Strike Force (Force), Veiksmo, Kriminalinis, Drama, 2015
programme.desc: Theo and Willem (Dennis van de Ven) pursue Theo's father. This leads them to a holiday village, where they encounter a gang of women's traffickers. What's the link between these criminals and Theo's father?

programme.title: Doomsday (Heimatland), Drama, Šveicarija, 2015
programme.desc: An apocalyptical storm threatens to wipe out an entire country. A state of emergency is raised while mayhem breaks out.

programme.title: Broken Promise (Nedodrzaný slub), Biografinis, Drama, Fantastinis, Karinis, Čekija, JAV, 2009
programme.desc: Based on a true story of a Jewish boy in Western Slovakia who escaped deportation to a concentration camp thanks to his extraordinary soccer talent and some coincidently favorable circumstances.

programme.title: Mafia Undercover (Solo), Kriminalinis, 2018
programme.desc: The mission isn't over yet for Agent Solo (Marco Bocci), now infiltrated within the Corona crime family. Agata (Carlotta Antonelli), daughter of boss Antonio (Renato Carpentieri), has been kidnapped and Marco has to go against the direct orders of his superiors to save her.

programme.title: Mafia Undercover (Solo), Kriminalinis, 2018
programme.desc: Unexpected news alter the course of destiny for Marco (Marco Bocci) and the old Boss; Bruno Corona (Peppino Mazzotta) is still alive and in prison, and is both mentally and physically drained. However, freeing Bruno soon becomes the only way to find out where Agata (Carlotta Antonelli) is being held hostage.

programme.title: Mafia Undercover (Solo), Kriminalinis, 2018
programme.desc: Following Bruno's (Peppino Mazzotta) escape from prison and Agata's (Carlotta Antonelli) rescue from Albania, the Corona family is finally reunited again. An opportunity for the Corona and Tridente families to reaffirm their positions of power presents itself when new conflict breaks out against the Palmieri family, who have risen to become the new bosses.

programme.title: Mafia Undercover (Solo), Kriminalinis, 2018
programme.desc: Following Don Antonio's (Renato Carpentieri) death, the alliance between Marco (Marco Bocci) and Bruno (Peppino Mazzotta) becomes increasingly fragile. For Marco, trying to persuade the police to compromise seems an impossible task; after the feud with the Palmieri family, the Head of Operations, Erika Mattei, no longer seems willing to negotiate for his return.

programme.title: Appointment with Death (Waidmannsdank), 2020
programme.desc: A murder shakes apart the lives of the residents of a remote mountain village. The killer is one of them.

programme.title: The Ultimate Game (Reverso), Trileris, 2021
programme.desc: The toxic rivalry between two brothers inflames when they decide to compete in a dangerous game. Both eager to win at any cost, the race quickly takes a shocking turn.

programme.title: Take Five (Take Five), Drama, 2013
programme.desc: Each a master in his trait, five men attempt to carry out the biggest heist of their lives: the Bank of Naples.

programme.title: Shattered Destinies (Reflection of Desires), Melodrama, 2020
programme.desc: Gene escapes from prison. In the meantime, Vika doubts about her future, she does not know how to reconcile her love life and with her job.

programme.title: Shattered Destinies (Reflection of Desires), Melodrama, 2018
programme.desc: The fashion house business is getting better. A team of fashion designers comes up with a new collection. Detectives search for Gene and find him at Liza's house.

programme.title: The Prague Mysteries (Zločiny Velké Prahy), Kriminalinis, Istorinis, Mistinis, 2021
programme.desc: An intricate web of estranged relationships and addictions end with the murder of a deeply religious woman and mother.

programme.title: The Prague Mysteries (Zločiny Velké Prahy), Kriminalinis, Istorinis, Mistinis, 2021
programme.desc: The corpse of a goldsmith is found with a fatal wound on his head. The only suspects are two reclusive monks

programme.title: Strike Force (Force), Veiksmo, Kriminalinis, Drama, 2015
programme.desc: Willem (Dennis van de Ven), Theo (Jeroen van Koningsbrugge) and Sam (Karien Noordhoff) join forces to uncover the plans of the Moliers gang. Willem struggles with family problems in Tilburg and gets a shocking surprise. Meanwhile, Roxy (Lisa Zweerman) comes forward with important new info about the extortion case…

programme.title: Strike Force (Force), Veiksmo, Kriminalinis, Drama, 2015
programme.desc: Theo (Jeroen van Koningsbrugge) goes undercover in Guy Moliers' (Pieter Embrechts) gang and confesses a secret to Willem (Dennis van de Ven). Sam (Karien Noordhoff) and Willem put everything on the line to put Tessa's abductor behind bars, while Maartje (Kiki van Deursen) has maneuvered herself into a very tricky situation.

programme.title: Shattered Destinies (Reflection of Desires), Melodrama, 2020
programme.desc: Gene escapes from prison. In the meantime, Vika doubts about her future, she does not know how to reconcile her love life and with her job.

programme.title: Fallen Empire (Rasín), Biografinis, Drama, 2018
programme.desc: Tired of how their country was run, two men decide to take refuge in Russia and build an exiled government. Soon they discover the price of their actions.

programme.title: Fallen Empire (Rasín), Biografinis, Drama, 2018
programme.desc: Patriotism is a willingness to sacrifice for your country. Two men did it and were sentenced to death for betraying the monarchy. They still managed to find independence.

programme.title: Tightrope (Landkrimi Tirol: Das Mädchen aus dem Bergsee), 2020
programme.desc: After the body of an escort girl is found in a mountain lake, the case quickly turns personal for the lead investigator.

programme.title: The Prague Mysteries (Zločiny Velké Prahy), Kriminalinis, Istorinis, Mistinis, 2021
programme.desc: An intricate web of estranged relationships and addictions end with the murder of a deeply religious woman and mother.

programme.title: The Informant (Herec), Drama, Trileris, Čekija, 2020
programme.desc: Lanik is a struggling actor. In hopes to get into good productions, he joins the Army's theatre company. There's a catch – he will also have to join the secret police.

programme.title: The Informant (Herec), Drama, Trileris, 2020
programme.desc: Lanik joins the ensemble of a Shakespeare production. He also has to decide between his role as an informant and the future of his loved ones.

programme.title: The Informant (Herec), Drama, Trileris, 2020
programme.desc: Sent to interrogation for the events with the Colonel, Lanik manages to escape torture and tries to meet his family. The plan is to escape to safety abroad.

programme.title: What Lies Beneath (De Held), Kriminalinis, Istorinis, Trileris, Olandija, 2016
programme.desc: After many years abroad, a woman's homecoming becomes a nightmare as she's the target of violent attacks. To stop them, she must dig deep into the darkness of her family's past.

programme.desc: After his longtime friend is found dead, a judge returns to his hometown in Italy. He discovers that the woman he once loved is now the local mafia boss.

programme.title: Tormented Souls (Zádusní obet), Kriminalinis, Mistinis, Čekija, 2017
programme.desc: A series of ritual murders ignite widespread terror in a small town. A seasoned detective arrives to investigate and unveils the darkest secrets of its residents.

programme.desc: Vladimir's fashion company prospers and so does his marriage. Newborn Henry becomes a beacon of their love.

programme.title: WITNESS (Witness)
programme.desc: Euronews WITNESS' brings world issues into focus through the experiences of men, women and children at the heart of the story. Anelise Borges goes beyond the headlines, debates and data analysis… and into people's lives. Committed to reporting without fear or favor, we will hear from those first affected by an event, investigate wrongdoing, and hold those in power accountable, while actually covering the world.

programme.title: WITNESS (Witness)

programme.title: State of the Union (State of the Union), Dokumentika, 2023
programme.desc: Euronews State of the Union focuses on the present posture of affairs in Europe and its interconnection with the rest of the world. Find out what is going on in politics and economy and what is on people's mind. Should we be worried or is there a reason for optimism regarding climate change, immigration crisis, European integration and changes of political landscape of Europe? Get all the answers in State of the Union every week on Euronews.

Priding themselves on impartiality and diversity in their delivery of news and their use of sources, they promise their viewers and their guests alike "All Views, All Voices, All Welcome". Euronews reaches nearly 400 million homes across 160 different countries, making it one of the widest reaching news channels on continental Europe. With a passion for providing the most up to date news on all topics, Euronews Tonight is the best place to catch up on everything European.

programme.desc: Euronews is Europe's number one news channel. Priding themselves on impartiality and diversity in their delivery of news and their use of sources, they promise their viewers and their guests alike "All Views, All Voices, All Welcome". Euronews reaches nearly 400 million homes across 160 different countries, making it one of the widest reaching news channels on continental Europe. With a passion for providing the most up to date news on all topics, Euronews Tonight is the best place to catch up on everything European.

programme.title: Pro Bull Riders (Pro Bull Riders), 2016
programme.desc: Join the toughest, the most extreme and the wildest sport ever- bull riding. Bull riding has been called "the most dangerous eight seconds in sports" with good reason. Years of preparation and just 8 desperate seconds of pure adrenaline to keep the saddle and impress the crowd with skills and talent, with one hand in the air without letting go of the rope. The tonne of bull fury is bucking, spinning, twisting, turning to get the rider off. The riders are not the only athletes, the bull itself is also considered an athlete. Tough sport, tough athletes, tough audience!

programme.title: Nomads Seeking Adventure (Nomads Seeking Adventure), 2016
programme.desc: Nomads Seeking Adventure mixes the adrenaline rush of extreme sports with the adventure of travel. Showcasing the passion of some of the greatest extreme sports professionals from around the globe, episodes feature such stories as pro mountain bikers taking to the rocky mountain terrain of Mexico's Copper Canyon; an international team of kayakers tackling the white-water dangers of New Zealand's south island; paragliding in the volcanic region of Mt. Teide on Tenerife in the Canary Islands; X games medalists travelling to the slopes of Haines, Alaska to face the challenges of heli-skiing; expert mountain bikers meeting up for five days of racing in Whistler, Canada.

programme.desc: Follow the exciting Dumball banger rally in India, an unique driving challenge that includes low value or scrap cars that get embellished and are driven as far as they can over a course of one week. The goal is to have fun and raise money for the charity.

programme.title: Nitro World Games: All Access (Nitro World Games: All Access), Dokumentika, JAV
programme.desc: Adrenaline-filled series that gives you a chance to go behind the scenes and take a closer look at the Nitro World Games, a famous annual extreme sports event. Viewers also have a unique chance to meet the winners of various competitions such as FMX Best Trick, BMX Best Trick, BMX Triple Hit, Scooter Best Trick, and more.

programme.title: Nitro Circus: Crazy Train (Nitro Circus, Crazy Train), Dokumentika, JAV, 2015
programme.desc: Follow extraordinary motocross driver Travis Pastrana and his crew as they go on tour across the globe, from Japan to Australia, performing even more dangerous and crazy stunts. This reality show allows action sports fans to dive into the daily life of those extreme athletes while not performing and gives us a look at the behind-the-scenes of their live shows. With exclusive footage and interviews with the crew, we see how Pastrana is striving to grow his Circus into a worldwide and recognised phenomenon while answering his fans burning questions about the worlds of extreme sport.

programme.title: Rumble & Hum (Rumble & Hum), 2017
programme.desc: Rumble & Hum is a reality tattoo and lifestyle show revolving around Lewis "Vudulew" Williams, who has finally opened his own tattoo studio. Lewis has got years of experience, both in South Africa and abroad, and he is multi international and local award winner. Together with his team of tattoo and piercing artists, Cole Moebius and Adrianne Black he uses the finest inks, vivid imagination and unstoppable creativity, combination of which results in most amazing and one-of-a-kind tattoos.

programme.title: Blue World (Blue World), JAV, 2016
programme.desc: Learn all there is to know about the deep blue sea with dynamic naturalist and underwater photographer Jonathan Bird. Co-produced by Jonathan Bird Productions and the non-profit organisation Oceanic Research Group, this show provides a fun and engaging learning platform, educating the viewers about all things underwater, including animal stories, marine research, recent discoveries and stunning underwater photography. A true family favourite, Jonathan Bird's Big Blue World is easily enjoyed by viewers of all ages, whether they're 6 or 76!

A true family favourite, Jonathan Bird's Big Blue World is easily enjoyed by viewers of all ages, whether they're 6 or 76!

programme.title: Nomads Seeking Adventure (Nomads Seeking Adventure)
programme.desc: Nomads Seeking Adventure mixes the adrenaline rush of extreme sports with the adventure of travel. Showcasing the passion of some of the greatest extreme sports professionals from around the globe, episodes feature such stories as pro mountain bikers taking to the rocky mountain terrain of Mexico's Copper Canyon; an international team of kayakers tackling the white-water dangers of New Zealand's south island; paragliding in the volcanic region of Mt. Teide on Tenerife in the Canary Islands; X games medalists travelling to the slopes of Haines, Alaska to face the challenges of heli-skiing; expert mountain bikers meeting up for five days of racing in Whistler, Canada.

programme.title: Cycling: Vuelta a Andalucía (Vuelta a Andalucía – Ruta Ciclista del Sol), 2019
programme.desc: The Andalucia Bike Race is Spain's premier mountain bike race, and one of the most outstanding in the world as recognized by the Union Cycliste Internationale (UCI). Incorporating six stages over six days, the race weaves its way up and down the Andalucia mountains at a blistering pace, routing through spectacular trails and sensational views. Elite and masters race categories offer individual and team leader board standings, with daily stage prizes, overall medals and prize money for the elite UCI riders. The pace of the competition never slows across the six stages, kicking off with the stage 1 time trial; a short, fast and intense 'flash stage', featuring single tracks mixed with overtaking sections. Five days, 32 kilometres and over 6,590 meters of ascent later, the 57.8km "finisher" stage 6 is the final test, as riders climb over 1,396 meters up the mythical Reventón and pass through Trasierra, before descending and finishing along Santo Domingo's unforgettable single-track trail. Riders choose their risks to secure an advantage, all the time fully conscious that one mistake navigating the rocky trails means their race is over. Winning this 9th edition of the Andalucia Bike Race, were Spain's David Valero in the men's elite, with Hildegunn Hovdenak of Norway tacking victory in the women's elite.

programme.title: Cape Epic (Mountainbike: Cape Epic), 2019
programme.desc: The Absa Cape Epic is the world's premier mountain bike stage race. The route changes every year, leading aspiring amateur and professional mountain bikers from around the world through roughly 700km of unspoilt scenery and 15 000m of accumulated climbing, over some of the most magnificent mountain passes in Western Cape in South Africa. The Absa Cape Epic is the most televised mountain bike stage race in the world and the only eight-day mountain bike stage race classed as hors catégorie by the Union Cycliste Internationale (UCI). This official UCI status makes it a highlight on the professional racer's calendar. The Absa Cape Epic also attracts aspiring amateur riders wanting to test themselves against the best. It is a full-service race, meaning that everything is taken care of from the start – all riders need to think about is riding.

programme.desc: From the racetrack to the suburban street, Shifting Gears delivers the most up-to-date news on cutting edge research, development and design. In Shifting Gears, we delve beneath the skin of some of the most advanced machines on the planet – we visit international motor shows for the newest releases and concept vehicles; uncover new advances in technology developed both in the laboratory and on the race track; keep up to date in the race for alternative fuels, improved safety, satellite navigation, in-car entertainment and multi-media connectivity; and look ahead to the designs and trends of the future. From luxury dream machines and fantasy prototypes to the globally marketed mainstays, our access to the world's leading race teams and automotive manufacturers ensure we have every corner covered. Enjoy the ride, as the future unfolds and we keep on shifting gears!

programme.title: Paragliding World Cup (Paragliding – World Cup)
programme.desc: The Paragliding World Cup Superfinal was staged in Roldanillo, Colombia with ten days of high level competition flying in one of the best paragliding venues in the world. One-hundred and twenty-two pilots competed, including 18 previous overall World Cup winners and 12 Women World Cup winners, ranking it as one of the toughest line-ups ever to face each other. Suspended in the air, this adventure sport features cross-country racing, with pilots needing to be an expert in understanding the impact of terrain on weather conditions.

programme.title: Shifting Gears (Shifting Gears)
programme.desc: From the racetrack to the suburban street, Shifting Gears delivers the most up-to-date news on cutting edge research, development and design. In Shifting Gears, we delve beneath the skin of some of the most advanced machines on the planet – we visit international motor shows for the newest releases and concept vehicles; uncover new advances in technology developed both in the laboratory and on the race track; keep up to date in the race for alternative fuels, improved safety, satellite navigation, in-car entertainment and multi-media connectivity; and look ahead to the designs and trends of the future. From luxury dream machines and fantasy prototypes to the globally marketed mainstays, our access to the world's leading race teams and automotive manufacturers ensure we have every corner covered. Enjoy the ride, as the future unfolds and we keep on shifting gears!

programme.title: The Outdoor Sports Show (Outdoor Sports Show), 2020

programme.title: Salomon Gore – Tex Maxi Race (Maxi race)
programme.desc: More than just a trail-race the Maxi Race takes runners on an 85km journey around the unique landscape of Lake Annecy, France. Athletes choose the Ultra, Vertical-Race or Marathon, pushing themselves to develop mountain skills and face their own personal challenges. The Salomon Gore-Tex Maxi Race is one of the best and most demanding trail running events, staged in the stunning lake and mountain scenery of the Haute Savoie.

programme.desc: This monthly magazine is dedicated to the story of Olympic Sailing, as the world's stars names and best rookies strive to compete on the world's greatest sports stage and claim their medals at the Olympic Games. To be a champion you need power, strength, skill, mental toughness, supreme ﬁtness and strategy. Broadcast by over 20 broadcasters in more than 95 countries, Sailing to Tokyo follows the long journey and deﬁning moments in athletes' careers as they aspire to make Olympic history.

programme.title: Hispania Rally 2020 (Hispania Rally 2020)
programme.desc: Hispania Rally took place in Guadix – Granada in 2020. It achieved to host more than 180 participants from more than 26 countries. What the Hispania Rally strong as well as unique is the hard to drive, Gorafe desert. This extraordinary location has led the Hispania Rally to be recognized as the only European rally that takes place in the sandy and hot desert.

programme.title: Extreme E: How to Build a Racing Car 3 (Extreme E: How to Build a Racing Car), Dokumentika, Didžioji Britanija, 2022
programme.desc: The brainchild of the people behind Formula E, "Extreme E" is a new all-electric off-road series, racing through some of the world's most extreme environments. Racing through these locations will hopefully help to bring to light the great challenges we face by climate change, whilst also helping these declining environments and the people inhabiting them along the way. A three-part documentary series in the run-up to the inaugural race, 'How to Build a Racing Car', 'Making Tracks', and 'The Electric Future'. Extreme E is putting the pedal to the metal in the fight for our environment.

programme.title: Boat Show 4K (Boat Show 4K), Dokumentika, Didžioji Britanija
programme.desc: Boat Show 4K is a weekly magazine series revolving around the cutting-edge news and top events of the international boat shows and the amazing world of alternative sports. The show presents top images of high speed entertainment from action sports, appreciated by nautical lovers and boat owners all over the globe. Have a look at shipyards, find out about the latest technologies in boat maintenance and repair, get some tips from high class professionals and celebrities.

programme.title: Fight Sports MMA (Fight Sports MMA)
programme.desc: From the ONE vault, recapping the amazing MMA, Muay Thai, and kickboxing action from ONE Championship. This episode features Chen Rui vs. Kwon Won II

programme.title: Mega Fights In 60 (Boxing: MEGA Fights In 60)
programme.desc: MEGA Fights are premiere events from the sport of boxing including HBO World Championship Boxing, historic PPV events plus past, current and future World Champions. This episode features the WBC World super welterweight title between undefeated Floyd Mayweather, Jr., aka "Money Pretty Boy" (37-0, 24 KOs) vs. "Golden Boy" Oscar De La Hoya (38-4, 20 KOs) from the MGM Grand in Las Vegas, Nevada, USA on May 5, 2007. The fight made $165 million in total gross revenue, making it the richest fight ever.

programme.title: Mega Fights In 60 (Boxing: MEGA Fights In 60)
programme.desc: MEGA Fights are premiere events from the sport of boxing including HBO World Championship Boxing and historic PPV events plus past, current and future World Champions. This episode features a Light Heavyweight Unification battle as WBO Champion Jean Pascal (25-1, 16 KOs) takes on undefeated IBO Champion, Chad Dawson, (29-0, 17 KOs) on August 14, 2010 at the Bell Centre in Montreal, Quebec, Canada. The fight ends in a decision after a controverial headbutt.

programme.title: Introducing (Introducing)
programme.desc: FIGHT SPORTS Presents 'Introducing:', a new original documentary series that covers the current stars of today and rising stars of tomorrow. Each episode we get an up close and personal perspective of their lives and see what drives them to be the best at what they do. Introducing: Caitlin Dechelle, provides an intimate look at one of the most dominant women in the history of martial arts tournaments. From tragedy to triumph to Hollywood, we see what has made Caitlin Dechelle become a real life Wonder Woman of today.

programme.title: BWF Martial Arts (BWF Martial Arts)

Also on the card, a heavyweight kickboxing clash between Errol Zimmerman vs. Rico Verhoeven.

programme.title: FS Grand Sumo. Show 2 (FS Grand Sumo)
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. programme.title: Macho: The Hector Camacho Story (Macho: The Hector Camacho Story), Dokumentika, JAV
programme.desc: This series takes a hard-hitting look at the rise, fall and untimely death of one of boxing's most colorful champions. Hector Camacho's dynamic speed, footwork and power made him a fighter to be reckoned with, but it was his flamboyance and showmanship that ushered in a new era in boxing. The series chronicles his epic battles inside the ring, his struggles with addiction outside of it and the mystery of the double homicide that claimed his life. It's an unflinching portrait of a fighter who transcended the sport but ultimately couldn't defeat his own demons. Part 1 of 4.

programme.title: Tuesday Night Fights (Tuesday Night Fights), 1996
programme.desc: This August FIGHT SPORTS revisits some of Hector Camacho's best fights from the legendary USA's Tuesday Night Fights series alongside our new documentary series Macho: The Hector Camacho Story. In this episode Hector "Macho" Camacho (61-3-1, 29 KO) vs. Heath Todd (32-10-0, 13 KO) in a 10-round Halbmittel contest from the War Memorial Auditorium in Ft. Lauderdale, FL, USA.

programme.title: Mega Fights (Mega Fights)
programme.desc: MEGA Fights are premiere events from the sport of boxing including HBO World Championship Boxing and historic PPV events plus past, current and future World Champions. This fight took place at the Silverdome in Pontiac, Michigan, USA on January 29, 2011. The brawl ended in controversy as "accidental" headbutts would cause a technical decision.

programme.title: Fight Sports WCK (FIGHT SPORTS WCK)
programme.desc: WCK features intense, nonstop battles in both freestyle kickboxing and Muay Thai from around the world. It's kickboxing's most talented athletes at their finest! This episode, from Newcastle, England, features Enfusion champion Iman Barlow (England) vs. Lara Fernandez (Spain).

programme.title: Knockouts! (Fight Sports: Knockouts Classics)
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is a heavyweight collision between Chris Arreola and Tomasz Adamek in a battle of one-loss competitors. Also on the card, Rocky Jearez takes on Jorge Barrios before a gruesome cut calls an end to the fight.

programme.title: FS Grand Sumo. Show 3 (FS Grand Sumo)
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. This new format presents Sumo in an authentic, in-depth and entertaining way covering the rules, ranks, match-ups, and more. Show 3 featuring Okinoumi, Kotoyuki, Kotoshogiku and Endo from the Aki basho, 2019.

programme.title: Wide World of Fights (Wide World of Fights)
programme.desc: This episode features an encounter between Andre Berto and Victor Ortiz, as well as kickboxing, sumo and more!

programme.title: MMA:30 (MMA:30)
programme.desc: This episode features ring girl Arianny Celeste making a high schooler's dreams come true when she goes as his date to his prom. Also, we catch up with Clay Guida and Urijah Faber at the LA Fit Expo and we go behind the scenes for an intimate photo shoot with beautiful ring girl Amber Nicole.

programme.title: Fight Sports MMA (Fight Sports MMA)
programme.desc: From the ONE vault, recapping the amazing MMA, Muay Thai, and kickboxing action from ONE Championship. This episode features Mauro Cerilli vs. Abdulbasir Vagabov

programme.title: Mega Fights (Mega Fights)
programme.desc: MEGA Fights are premiere events from the sport of boxing including HBO World Championship Boxing and historic PPV events plus past, current and future World Champions. This episode features a battle of unbeaten junior welterweights to unify the WBC and WBO world titles as Timothy Bradley, aka 'Desert Storm', (26-0, 11 KOs) faces Devon Alexander "The Great" (21-1, 13 KOs). This fight took place at the Silverdome in Pontiac, Michigan, USA on January 29, 2011. The brawl ended in controversy as "accidental" headbutts would cause a technical decision.

Show 3 featuring Okinoumi, Kotoyuki, Kotoshogiku and Endo from the Aki basho, 2019.

programme.title: Wide World of Fights (Wide World of Fights)
programme.desc: This episode features an encounter between Andre Berto and Victor Ortiz, as well as kickboxing, sumo and more!

programme.title: Judo for the World (Judo for the World)
programme.desc: Judo for the World features the best competitors in the sport as they compete in a global tour for an opportunity to vie for the gold in the World Judo Championship. In this episode we see the best Judo from the Tashkent Grand Prix, we speak with one of Israel's fighters Sagi Muki about the importance of positivity in the face of adversity, and we stop to get to know Dzmitry Minkou, a young talent in the world of Judo.

programme.title: XMA (XMA)
programme.desc: In this episode we look at different weapons used throughout the martial arts and the technology used to make them stronger and more efficient.

programme.title: BWF Martial Arts (BWF Martial Arts)
programme.desc: Featuring Team Form and Weapons at the ISKA US Open from Disney, Orlando, Florida, USA.

programme.title: Mega Fights (Mega Fights)
programme.desc: MEGA Fights are premiere events from the sport of boxing including HBO World Championship Boxing and historic PPV events plus past, current and future World Champions. This episode features a battle of unbeaten junior welterweights to unify the WBC and WBO world titles as Timothy Bradley, aka 'Desert Storm', (26-0, 11 KOs) faces Devon Alexander "The Great" (21-1, 13 KOs). This fight took place at the Silverdome in Pontiac, Michigan, USA on January 29, 2011. The brawl ended in controversy as "accidental" headbutts would cause a technical decision.

Show 3 featuring Okinoumi, Kotoyuki, Kotoshogiku and Endo from the Aki basho, 2019.

programme.title: Wide World of Fights (Wide World of Fights)
programme.desc: This episode features an encounter between Andre Berto and Victor Ortiz, as well as kickboxing, sumo and more!

programme.title: Judo for the World (Judo for the World)
programme.desc: Judo for the World features the best competitors in the sport as they compete in a global tour for an opportunity to vie for the gold in the World Judo Championship. In this episode we see the best Judo from the Tashkent Grand Prix, we speak with one of Israel's fighters Sagi Muki about the importance of positivity in the face of adversity, and we stop to get to know Dzmitry Minkou, a young talent in the world of Judo.

programme.title: XMA (XMA)
programme.desc: In this episode we look at different weapons used throughout the martial arts and the technology used to make them stronger and more efficient.

programme.title: BWF Martial Arts (BWF Martial Arts)
programme.desc: Featuring Team Form and Weapons at the ISKA US Open from Disney, Orlando, Florida, USA.

programme.title: WCCB (Boxing: WCCB), 2017
programme.desc: Alicia Ashley (24-11-1, 4 KOs), (10-0, 6 KOs) arrives in Struer, Denmark to face Dina Thorslund for the WBC World Female Super Bantam Championship. Ashley, an experienced boxer and Jamaican immigrant raised in Brooklyn, New York, will contest Thorslund, a local Dane, at the Struer Arena in the first World Championship fight in Denmark in more than 5 years.

programme.title: Wide World of Fights (Wide World of Fights)
programme.desc: This episode features Carlos Quintana's penultimate bout, as he fights Deandre Latimore, in a light middleweight title contest, as well as kickboxing, sumo and more!

programme.title: BWF Martial Arts (BWF Martial Arts)
programme.desc: Featuring Men's CMX Forms and Weapons, and a World Record Break by Chip Townsend at the ISKA US Open from Disney, Orlando, Florida, USA.

programme.title: Knockouts! (Fight Sports: Knockouts Classics)
programme.desc: The main event in this episode sees Saul (Canelo) Alvarez making his first defense of the WBC light middleweight title, taking on challenger Ryan Rhodes. The bout ends in the final round after a series of unanswered blows. Also on the card, action from former light heavyweight champ Adonis Stevenson.

programme.title: FS Grand Sumo. Show 4 (FS Grand Sumo)
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. This new format presents Sumo in an authentic, in-depth and entertaining way covering the rules, ranks, match-ups, and more. Show 4 featuring Shodai, Takakeisho, Ryuden and Aoiyama from the Aki basho, 2019.

programme.title: Fight Quest (Fight Quest), Dokumentika, JAV
programme.desc: Episode 10: California, USA – Hosts Jimmy Smith and Doug Anderson learn the Fight Discipline of Kajukenbo and the Martial Art of Hands, Feet and Throws with Masters Charles Gaylord and Greg Harper.

programme.title: Death and the Knight (Death and the Knight), Animacinis, 2020
programme.desc: Secluded for ages inside his tower, an immortal Knight is awoken from his slumber by a mysterious whisper and sets off on a perilous journey to find and confront an elusive enemy.

programme.title: McLintock! (McLintock!), Komedija, JAV, 1963
programme.desc: The tycoon in cattle breeding, George Washington McLintock, respected by local farmers, is the richest man in the territory. Wealthy rancher uses his influence to keep peace between them, Indians and corrupt government officials. The predictable life of McLintock changes unexpectedly when come to him his teenage daughter Becky and wife Katherine, with whom he has split up a long time ago.

programme.title: Moonlighting (Moonlighting), Drama, Didžioji Britanija, 1982
programme.desc: A Polish contractor, Nowak, leads a group of workmen to London so they can provide cheap labor for a government official based there. Nowak (Irons) has to manage the project and the men as they encounter the tempations of the West and loneliness and separation from their families. Nowak is the only one of the group who speaks English, and he uses this as a tool over his team. When the unrest in Poland leads to a military takeover, Nowak is faced with a much more difficult situation than he expected.

programme.title: No Regrets for My Youth (Waga seishun ni kuinashi), Drama, 1946
programme.desc: In 1933, in Kyoto, the academic freedom is under attack and the spoiled daughter of Professor Yagihara, Yukie Yagihara, is courted by the idealistic student Ruykichi Noge and by the tolerant Itokawa. When the academic freedom is crushed by the fascists, Professor Yagihara and the members of the Faculty of Law resigns from their positions and Noge is arrested. Five years later, Noge visits Professor Yagihara and his family under the custody of the now Prosecutor Itokawa and tells that he is going to China. Yukie decides to move alone to Tokyo and years later, she meets Itokawa in Tokyo and he tells that Noge is living in Tokyo. Yukie visits Noge and they become lovers. In 1941, Noge is arrested accused of ringleader of a spy network and Yukie is also sent to prison. When she is released, she decides to move to the peasant village where Noge's parents live and are blamed of being spies by the villagers. She changes her lifestyle and works hard with Madame Noge planting rice and earning...

programme.title: The Tailor (The Tailor), Drama, 2015
programme.desc: July 1944. San Miniato, Italy, is occupied by the Nazis. Paolino, the local tailor, receives a visit of the SS officer Rudolf Schmidt, who commissioned him a suit.

programme.title: The Harvest (The Harvest), Dokumentika, 2017
programme.desc: Thousands of foreign workers support today the most known Italian excellence: agri-food production. A docu-musical shows their daily exploitation.

programme.title: Under Capricorn (Under Capricorn), Melodrama, Didžioji Britanija, 1949
programme.desc: In 1831, Irishman Charles Adare travels to Australia to start a new life with the help of his cousin who has just been appointed governor. When he arrives he meets powerful landowner and ex-convict Sam Flusky, who wants to do a business deal with him. Whilst attending a dinner party at Flusky's house, Charles meets Flusky's wife Henrietta who he had known as a child back in Ireland. Henrietta is an alcoholic and seems to be on the verge of madness.

programme.title: The Water (The Water), Drama, 2019
programme.desc: A man wakes up in a world where the water has disappeared. There's no water in the pipes nor in the bottles. Not even one drop falls from the clouds. The sea itself has become a desert. However, everyone acts as if nothing happened. In the bars they sip from empty glasses, from a springboard a diver falls into a dry pool. Alone, the protagonist realizes the incredible disappearance – and nobody pays attention to him.

programme.title: Solaris (Solyaris), 1972
programme.desc: A psychologist is sent to a station orbiting a distant planet in order to discover what has caused the crew to go insane. When he encounters there his wife who has been dead for ten years, he begins to appreciate the baffling nature of the alien intelligence. A script based on the novel by Stanislaw Lem.

programme.title: To Live (Huo zhe), Drama, 1994
programme.desc: Fugui and Jiazhen endure tumultuous events in China as their personal fortunes move from wealthy landownership to peasantry. Addicted to gambling, Fugui loses everything. In the years that follow he is pressed into both the nationalist and communist armies, while Jiazhen is forced into menial work. They raise a family and survive, managing "to live" from the 40's to the 70's in this epic, but personal, story of life through an amazing period.

programme.title: The Earth Will Tremble (La terra trema), Drama, 1948
programme.desc: In rural Sicily, the fishermen live at the mercy of the greedy wholesalers. One family risks everything to buy their own boat and operate independently.

programme.title: A Dinner for Them to Meet (La Cena per Farli Conoscere), Komedija, 2007
programme.desc: Italian director Pupi Avati contrasts his 2007 English-language thriller The Hideout with this sentimental, distinctively Italian comedy concerning a failed actor who can't help but obsess over his lackluster career. After the depressive thespian makes a half-hearted suicide attempt, his three daughters flock to be by his side and organize a surprise dinner party designed to set him up with a potential mate. Later, as dinner gets underway, the situation takes an unexpected turn.

programme.title: The Man with the Golden Arm (The Man with the Golden Arm), Drama, JAV, 1955
programme.desc: Classic cinema of the 50s with Frank Sinatra, Eleanor Parker and Kim Novak in the main roles. Frankie Machine, the king of poker addicted to heroin, leaves prison. He's left the addiction and has discovered his new passion – playing the drums. He also wants to start a new life with a beautiful woman, but his wife is waiting for him at home and she needs money for rehabilitation. To get them, Frankie gradually returns to his old life.

programme.title: About German Women (Über die Deutsche Frau), Drama, 2021
programme.desc: Ingolstadt 1929: In search of the "German Woman", the young author Marieluise Fleißer creates her emancipated alter ego in her novel character Frieda Geier, who knows how to assert herself in the business world. Fleißer herself, however, suffers from the female image of her time, and her own self-doubts, until the one and only Frieda Geier suddenly shows up and turns her life upside down.

programme.title: John Wayne – Gold Strike River (The Lucky Texan), Vesternas, JAV, 1934
programme.desc: Jerry Mason (Wayne), a young Texan, and Jake Benson (Hayes), an old rancher, become partners and strike it rich with a gold mine. They then find their lives complicated by bad guys and a woman.

programme.title: Sister (Sestra), Drama, 2020
programme.desc: Sofia, Bulgaria in the present day. A boy from a well-to-do family is in love with Bonnie, a teenager from the impoverished outskirts. In order to test his love, Bonnie's older sister, Lionnie, subjects the suitor to a humiliating ordeal. Will he pass or fail? And what do failure and success mean? Even when it comes to love, the rich and the poor speak different languages.

programme.title: The Bicycle Thief (Ladri di biciclette), Drama, 1948
programme.desc: In post-war Italy, Antonio is offered a job that requires a bicycle. Selling his bed sheets, he manages to buy a bike. On his first day it is stolen forcing Antonio, and his son, to search the city. One of the best-known and most widely acclaimed European movies considered the neo-surrealist Italian masterpiece. The movie received a special Academy Award as ""most outstanding foreign film"" seven years before that Oscar category was officially introduced.

programme.title: Adivina (Adivina), Drama, 2017
programme.desc: Entitled Fortune-Teller, the film follows Mauricio, a man whose lost many things he once took for granted. In act of illogical desperation, he visits a carnival fortune-teller to try and tie up lose ends he left along the way. With her help, the fortune-teller shows him an alternate reality.

programme.title: AUN: The Beginning and the End of All Things (AUN: The Beginning and the End of All Things), 2011
programme.desc: When looking for alternative energy sources, the Japanese scientist Sekai tragically dies. Twenty years later the Brazilian mathematician Euclides continues his research. The lack of an essential component won't allow a breakthrough. Only AUN, Sekai's son, seems to hold the key to protect mankind from self-destruction. In the aftermath of the nuclear tragedy in Fukushima the film appears like a prophecy. AUN's dream-like images, complemented by music from Christian Fennesz and Ryuichi Sakamoto, lead into a fantastic and exciting world, full of brightness and darkness of life.

programme.title: Cleaner (Cleaner), Drama, 2018
programme.desc: Narges, a public toilet cleaner, has to wait for 5 minutes to see what the result of her pregnancy test is. In this 5 minutes, she dives in her dream. The dream that makes her separate from reality.

programme.title: Dog Men (Dog Men), Šveicarija, 2014
programme.desc: In a not-too-distant future only a few homo sapiens are left. Struggling for survival they are forced to live from hunting the last remaining animals in the peripheral ruins of an advanced human civilization. But they are unaware of being stalked themselves by a mysterious scanner. A science-fiction story about hunting and being hunted, about extinction and survival, about dogs – and men.

programme.title: Game Show Dynamos (Game Show Dynamos), Dokumentika, JAV, 2015
programme.desc: Bernard and Claire Boiko won enough money on TV game shows to escape debt and rebuild their lives. From Tic-Tac-Dough in 1956 to Jeopardy in 1967 to Trivial Pursuit in 1993, they competed on national television 28 times -- probably the longest-running record of individual TV game show appearances by husband and wife in the world. Daughter Patricia melds 10 different TV game shows and a snappy soundtrack with vivid motion graphics and vintage footage to paint an intimate portrait of her quirky parents, paradigms of 20th century family life. Yet -- as their poignant romance and ribald experiences reveal the fascinating historical context of their times -- the winning couple also come to be seen as curiously-relatable outsiders to mainstream culture. Themes of love, hardship, and achievement add emotional weight to Bernard's parting words, 'If it's a lucky life, it's mine.' Quick cash and fabulous prizes, the thrill of winning and the lasting joy of this different family make this a wonderful story of dreams unexpectedly fulfilled.

programme.title: The Outsider (L'estraneo), Drama, 2018
programme.desc: Milano, nowadays. Cristian is a 30's employed at an agency as graphic-designer until short time ago, who has decided to quit due to his creative uneasiness and various intolerances, and who is now trying to look for his own way. Just this is the problem: he's living such a moment considered by most as a limbo, when he doesn't know neither how to make a choice nor what might he expect for the future. Steady and still in such a precariousness, Cristian lives day by day on a shoestring, he meets some friends attending the usual bar, drinking and philosophizing into the night: Willy, a dandy old comrade, joke always ready, who's lifestyle is hearted; Sergio, an actor, a bit frustrated but highly cultured and a good close friend. In the middle of this suspended situation Cristian falls in love with Greta, a girl speaking with Spanish accent, a little bit younger than him, who spreads a light and enthusiasm quite different from Cristian's. He lives his love affairs, but, as often happens, "love is not enough", and soon Christian himself calls into question his whole life and people belonging to it, in order to find serenity.

programme.title: Schengen (Schengen), Drama, 2012
programme.desc: In one Paris divided militarily into two like was the former Berlin Est-Ouest, Ines Raymond receives from the right bank people who ask for a visa for the left bank. Each have their reasons and dreams for crossing the Seine, but, Ines must follow the new instructions.

programme.title: Talea (Talea), Drama, 2013
programme.desc: Summertime. Everybody is excited to go on vacation to Italy. Everybody but Jasmin. Jasmin is yearning something. She wants to be with Eva, her mother, from whom she had to live seperately for a long time. For weeks, Jasmin is trying to get close to Eva. She does not give up, even if she's rejected. After an argument, Jasmin runs away from her fosterhome and convinces Eva to leave the city together and go on a trip. The two get closer -- sometimes as friends, sometimes as mother and daughter. A first joint cigarette, a dance in the village disco, wanderings through the woods. But expectations and needs of the girl and her mother are diverging repeatedly, especially when a man attracts Eva's attention and disturbs the growing closeness between mother and daughter.

programme.title: Bending the Rules (Ghaedeye tasadof), Drama, 2013
programme.desc: An enthusiastic and amateur theatrical group finds the opportunity to perform abroad which is a great success. Sheherazad, a desperate girl, joins the group and takes the leading role in the play. She decides, unlike her other fellow actors to tell the truth to her father. He is against this trip. The group is now in a dilemma: replace her or…. "Bending the Rules" is the story of the third generation of the Iranian Revolution that does not want to compromise on their principles and rights with their parents.

programme.title: Passionate Plumber (The Passionate Plumber), Komedija, JAV, 1932
programme.desc: To make her lover jealous, a beautiful socialite passes off a bumbling plumber as her paramour.

programme.title: Father (Father), Animacinis, 2012
programme.desc: When did you last talk with your father? Will you ever ask him about those things that hurt you? In Father the reality of life is turned upside down to create an impossible dialogue – the dialogue between a child and a father that never happens.

programme.title: The Exterminating Angel (El ángel exterminador), Komedija, 1962
programme.desc: After a lavish dinner party, the guests find themselves mysteriously unable to leave the room... and over the next few days all the elaborate pretenses and facades that they've built up by virtue of their position in society collapse completely as they become reduced to living like animals...

programme.title: Death and the Knight (Death and the Knight), Animacinis, 2020
programme.desc: Secluded for ages inside his tower, an immortal Knight is awoken from his slumber by a mysterious whisper and sets off on a perilous journey to find and confront an elusive enemy.

programme.title: The Brute (El Bruto), Melodrama, 1953
programme.desc: In the 50's, in a poor community in Mexico, the landlord Andrés Cabrera wants to evict his tenants to demolish the buildings and sell the land by a large amount. However, the leader of the community Carmelo González resists to his attempts. Andrés hires the strong slaughterhouse worker Pedro El Bruto to intimidate the dwellers, and his wife Pamola sexually harasses Pedro. Pedro goes to the community in the night and he hits the weak Carmelo that has a bleed and dies. When Pedro meets Carmelo's daughter Meche, he falls in love with her and she moves to his house. But the jealous Paloma does not want to give up on Pedro.

programme.title: The War Is Over (The War Is Over), Drama, Šveicarija, 2010
programme.desc: Following the bombardment of Kosovo in 1999, the Rahmanis and their three children emigrate to Switzerland. After years of living in their new homeland, the family faces the prospects of deportation. "No one is proud to be a refugee, but when it comes to me, I am not ashamed of who I am" says Rasim – the father of the family and an ex music teacher. Desperate to stay he invents an Albanian Dance Troupe in order to garner signatures of support from the community… The intimate narrative explores the experience of forced migration: the fraught decision to leave; the process of integration and adaptation to a new country; the impact on the family; and always, the yearning for the homeland.

programme.title: The Blue Angel (L'ange bleu), Miuziklas, 1930
programme.desc: An elderly professor's ordered life spins dangerously out of control when he falls for a nightclub singer.

programme.title: Univitellin (Univitellin), Drama, 2016
programme.desc: Marseille, today. Aminata works as a hairdresser in an Afro hairdressing salon, Badara works as mecanich. When they meet, their love story will change their lives.

programme.title: Stromboli (Stromboli, terra di Dio), Melodrama, JAV, 1950
programme.desc: Soon after the end of World War II Karen, a young refugee from Lithuania meets Antonio, an Italian fisherman in a camo for displaced persons. They marry and settle down on the volcanic island of Stromboli. The woman feels very lonely and alienated but her husband refuses to let her leave. Roberto Rossellini who directed the film and Ingrid Bergman who played the lead female part had an affair during making of the movie which ended up in a scandal once the actress decided to leave her husband and a child in order to marry the Italian filmmaker. "Stromboli" was nominated to the Golden Lion award in Venice.

programme.title: Jail Caesar (Jail Caesar), Istorinis, Didžioji Britanija, 2012
programme.desc: Paul Schoolman, a filmmaker from South Africa chose to portray the early years in the life of Julius Caesar through a story told from three prisons (Pollsmoor, Cape Town, Cardiff in Wales, and Drumheller in Canada). While he hired such great actors as Derek Jacobi, he also engaged a cast of real inmates. The movie was screened at several film festivals including Moscow and Chicago.

programme.title: Under the Rainbow (Under the Rainbow), Drama, 2018
programme.desc: Set in a modern day South Africa, the film is a vignette into the lives of two working class men – Bonile and Alhein, as they travel the city by night hanging cardboard signs with tomorrow's news headlines on them.

programme.title: Sapo (Sapo), Drama, 2018
programme.desc: Jeremías Gallardo, a prominent Chilean journalist who, on January 29th, 1986, covers the last death sentence in the country, which was carried out in the prison of Valparaiso. That same day, his wife is giving birth to her first child at a clinic in the capital. Gallardo's return to Santiago becomes an inner journey where he will relive moments from his dark past, linked to the intelligence services of that time. The film is structured in fragmentary flashbacks and reconstructs Gallardo's character and personality.

programme.title: No Drowning (No Drowning), Drama, 2016
programme.desc: In a vague and futuristic world, people must pay for every single service in their life. When a stripper and a thief meet, they find a meaning within it.

programme.title: Slow TV (Slow TV), Dokumentika, 2020
programme.desc: Colors of spring.

programme.title: Beirut (Beirut), Kriminalinis, Drama, Trileris, JAV, 2018
programme.desc: Caught in the crossfires of civil war, CIA operatives must send a former U.S. diplomat to negotiate for the life of a friend he left behind.

programme.title: Just Getting Started (Just Getting Started), Komedija, JAV, 2017
programme.desc: An ex-F.B.I. Agent and an ex-mob lawyer in the Witness Protection Program have to put aside their petty rivalry on the golf course to fend off a mob hit.

They send their photos and videos, which are verified and contextualized by France 24 team of professional journalists in Paris. The Observers are volunteers, and are not paid for their contributions.

programme.title: Truth or Fake (Truth or Fake)
programme.desc: In our fast-moving challenging world it is of fundamental importance to sort what's true from what's fake online. The Truth or Fake is a short program designed to alert everyone to the dangers of fake news. The hosts emphasize that media literacy is a key part of the broad fight against disinformation. They educate the viewers and discourage people from sharing the news or talking about something they do not know for sure is true. Check some real examples of fake news and see how to detect when images have been falsified or words taken out of context.

programme.title: Truth or Fake (Truth or Fake)
programme.desc: In our fast-moving challenging world it is of fundamental importance to sort what's true from what's fake online. The Truth or Fake is a short program designed to alert everyone to the dangers of fake news. The hosts emphasize that media literacy is a key part of the broad fight against disinformation. They educate the viewers and discourage people from sharing the news or talking about something they do not know for sure is true. Check some real examples of fake news and see how to detect when images have been falsified or words taken out of context.

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service (Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service), Animacinis
programme.desc: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service is a children's stop animation series, a spin off of the original series about the popular postman. Pat is now promoted to Head of SDS and this changes his work. He now goes for special deliveries traveling to the nearby town of Pencaster from the Mail Centre. His red van is replaced with other vehicles: a helicopter, a motorbike and a Jeep, but his faithful friend, the little black cat Jess is always with him. Instead of letters Pat is now delivering all kinds of objects, from telescopes to robots. But despite all the changes he's still the friendliest postman in Greendale.

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service (Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service), Animacinis
programme.desc: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service is a children's stop animation series, a spin off of the original series about the popular postman. Pat is now promoted to Head of SDS and this changes his work. He now goes for special deliveries traveling to the nearby town of Pencaster from the Mail Centre. His red van is replaced with other vehicles: a helicopter, a motorbike and a Jeep, but his faithful friend, the little black cat Jess is always with him. Instead of letters Pat is now delivering all kinds of objects, from telescopes to robots. But despite all the changes he's still the friendliest postman in Greendale.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Peppa Pig), Nuotykių, Animacinis, Visai šeimai, Didžioji Britanija, 2004
programme.desc: Adorable Peppa Pig is admired not only by kids but also by adults all over the world. Peppa lives together with her family, George Pig-her little brother, Mummy Pig and Daddy Pig. Peppa likes to jump in muddy puddles and play with her best friend Suzy Ship. George is too small, he barely talks, he never separates from his toy dinosaur. Mummy Pig and Daddy Pig are loving and caring parents, they go to work every day. Whether they're playing games, going to the playground or visiting their cousins, Peppa and her family are there to educate on everything life-related.

programme.title: Polly Pocket (Polly Pocket), Animacinis, JAV, 2018
programme.desc: Often told she is too little to do all the things she wants to do, Polly doesn't let this stand in her way and proves what every kid should know... that being little isn't a limitation. Instead, its her greatest strength! Inheriting a magic locket that allows her to shrink to only 4 inches tall, she discovers that no matter how small she is, she can still have big adventures and create a big difference for her and her best friends! Based on the famous Polly Pocket doll, this Canadian-American animation TV series features 26 episodes of big adventures, lots of imagination and even more fun!

programme.title: Pikwik Pack (Pikwik Pack), Animacinis, Vaikams, 2020
programme.desc: Pikwik Pack follows four adorable animals, Suki the hedgehog, Axel the raccoon, Tibor the hippo and Hazel the cat as they deliver magical packages filled with love to the kind citizens of Pikwik. Every day, a new surprise package arrives. The team might face rough rapids, stormy skies, or a foggy forest, but when they work together, they always deliver! The series is packed with big adventures, silly hijinks, and heartfelt charm that will entertain preschoolers while underscoring the value of community, responsibility and teamwork.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends (Thomas & Friends), Animacinis, 2021
programme.desc: Thomas and Friends presents life on Island of Sodor somewhere in Britain. There are several railways where all machines are animate creatures, they live and work there. Each of them tries to perform their job perfectly. The main character is a little blue tank engine Thomas, who travels to different places, gets to know different people and helps everybody who need it. Sometimes Thomas makes mistakes but it only teaches him not to repeat them in future. His friends are as hardworking as he is. Thomas and his team deliver mails, repair railway, take passengers wherever they need. Thomas and Friends can teach young viewers significant lessons of true value of friendship and importance of teamwork.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Peppa Pig), Nuotykių, Animacinis, Visai šeimai, Didžioji Britanija, 2004
programme.desc: Adorable Peppa Pig is admired not only by kids but also by adults all over the world. Peppa lives together with her family, George Pig-her little brother, Mummy Pig and Daddy Pig. Peppa likes to jump in muddy puddles and play with her best friend Suzy Ship. George is too small, he barely talks, he never separates from his toy dinosaur. Mummy Pig and Daddy Pig are loving and caring parents, they go to work every day. Whether they're playing games, going to the playground or visiting their cousins, Peppa and her family are there to educate on everything life-related.

programme.title: Care Bears: Unlock the Magic (Care Bears: Unlock the Magic), Animacinis, Komedija, JAV, 2019
programme.desc: The series follows fun adventures of Good Luck Bear, Funshine Bear, Cheer Bear, Grumpy Bear, and Share Bear. They start a new adventure through the Silver Lining, a strange world neighbored by the Whiffles. Whiffles are a group of innocently happy creatures that plant seeds to keep the magical land of Care-A-Lot and the neighboring Silver Lining growing. The Care Bears spread caring and sharing throughout the land. They teach to rely on friendship, and be brave. Their enemies are the Bad Crowd, which are led by Bluster to plant the Bad Seeds.

programme.title: Pikwik Pack (Pikwik Pack), Animacinis, Vaikams, 2020
programme.desc: Pikwik Pack follows four adorable animals, Suki the hedgehog, Axel the raccoon, Tibor the hippo and Hazel the cat as they deliver magical packages filled with love to the kind citizens of Pikwik. Every day, a new surprise package arrives. The team might face rough rapids, stormy skies, or a foggy forest, but when they work together, they always deliver! The series is packed with big adventures, silly hijinks, and heartfelt charm that will entertain preschoolers while underscoring the value of community, responsibility and teamwork.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends (Thomas & Friends), Animacinis, 2021
programme.desc: Thomas and Friends presents life on Island of Sodor somewhere in Britain. There are several railways where all machines are animate creatures, they live and work there. Each of them tries to perform their job perfectly. The main character is a little blue tank engine Thomas, who travels to different places, gets to know different people and helps everybody who need it. Sometimes Thomas makes mistakes but it only teaches him not to repeat them in future. His friends are as hardworking as he is. Thomas and his team deliver mails, repair railway, take passengers wherever they need. Thomas and Friends can teach young viewers significant lessons of true value of friendship and importance of teamwork.

The Care Bears spread caring and sharing throughout the land. They teach to rely on friendship, and be brave. Their enemies are the Bad Crowd, which are led by Bluster to plant the Bad Seeds.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Peppa Pig), Nuotykių, Animacinis, Visai šeimai, Didžioji Britanija, 2004
programme.desc: Adorable Peppa Pig is admired not only by kids but also by adults all over the world. Peppa lives together with her family, George Pig-her little brother, Mummy Pig and Daddy Pig. Peppa likes to jump in muddy puddles and play with her best friend Suzy Ship. George is too small, he barely talks, he never separates from his toy dinosaur. Mummy Pig and Daddy Pig are loving and caring parents, they go to work every day. Whether they're playing games, going to the playground or visiting their cousins, Peppa and her family are there to educate on everything life-related.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends (Thomas & Friends), Animacinis, 2021
programme.desc: Thomas and Friends presents life on Island of Sodor somewhere in Britain. There are several railways where all machines are animate creatures, they live and work there. Each of them tries to perform their job perfectly. The main character is a little blue tank engine Thomas, who travels to different places, gets to know different people and helps everybody who need it. Sometimes Thomas makes mistakes but it only teaches him not to repeat them in future. His friends are as hardworking as he is. Thomas and his team deliver mails, repair railway, take passengers wherever they need. Thomas and Friends can teach young viewers significant lessons of true value of friendship and importance of teamwork.

programme.desc: Often told she is too little to do all the things she wants to do, Polly doesn't let this stand in her way and proves what every kid should know... that being little isn't a limitation. Instead, its her greatest strength! Inheriting a magic locket that allows her to shrink to only 4 inches tall, she discovers that no matter how small she is, she can still have big adventures and create a big difference for her and her best friends! Based on the famous Polly Pocket doll, this Canadian-American animation TV series features 26 episodes of big adventures, lots of imagination and even more fun!

programme.desc: Join Barbie "Malibu" Roberts and Barbie "Brooklyn" Roberts for fun, laughter and exciting new adventures. The series follows Barbie and Barbie as they attend a year of performing arts high school in NYC, set out to record a music demo, and take odd jobs to fund their dreams, all while exploring the Big Apple and traveling back to Malibu often to visit family and friends. Filled with stories about friendship, family, passion and perseverance, the series follows this iconic duo as they work hard and have fun chasing their dreams.

programme.title: Endlings (Endlings), Nuotykių, 2021
programme.desc: Out-of-this-world sci-fi series that follows four foster kids who will embark on an adventure of a lifetime when they discover an Alien on their farm after its spaceship crashes. Meet Julia, a 14-year-old orphan, who is sent to live with Mr. Leopold on his beautiful farm, where she meets three other foster kids- Johnny, Tabby and Finn. The lives of four kids will change forever, when they find an injured Alien on their property. They will all work together to help Alien and save and recapture various endangered and magical creatures from across the galaxy- ''endlings'', that were released when the Alien's ship crashed.

programme.title: Endlings (Endlings), Nuotykių, 2021
programme.desc: Out-of-this-world sci-fi series that follows four foster kids who will embark on an adventure of a lifetime when they discover an Alien on their farm after its spaceship crashes. Meet Julia, a 14-year-old orphan, who is sent to live with Mr. Leopold on his beautiful farm, where she meets three other foster kids- Johnny, Tabby and Finn. The lives of four kids will change forever, when they find an injured Alien on their property. They will all work together to help Alien and save and recapture various endangered and magical creatures from across the galaxy- ''endlings'', that were released when the Alien's ship crashed.

programme.title: Montreux Jazz Festival 2018 (Montreux Jazz Festival 2018), Miuziklas, 2018
programme.desc: Hugh Coltman Recorded on July 11, 2018, at Montreux Jazz Club, at Montreux Jazz Festival TV Drector, Marc Schütrumpf

programme.title: Antonio Zambujo – Rua Da Emenda – La Cigale (Paris) (Antonio Zambujo – Rua Da Emenda – La Cigale (Paris)), Miuziklas, 2015
programme.desc: Antonio Zambujo – Rua da Emenda Antonio Zambujo (voice, Classical guitar) Bernardo Couto (portugese guitar) Ricardo Cruz (double bass) Joao Moreira (trumpet) Jose Conde (clarinette) Antonio Zambujo, a singer with a sensual and warm voice who delivers with his quintet an interpretation of fado between cool jazz and bossa nova. Recroded on January 23, 2015 at La Cigale (Paris) TV Director, Samuel Thiebaut

programme.title: Felipe Cabrera " Medusa " with Judith Sánchez Ruiz (Felipe Cabrera "Medusa" with Judith Sánchez Ruiz), Miuziklas, 2021
programme.desc: "Medusa" Felipe Cabrera (double bass, composition) Leonardo Monatana (piano) Lukmil Perez (drums) Judith Sánchez Ruiz (choreography, dance) The music of "Medusa" was born in Havana, during a 110-day lock-down when Felipe Cabrera found himself alone in the country that saw him grow up. Pillar of the great Cuban jazz school, the double bassist based in Paris has decided to turn his accidental return to his native country into art in times of pandemic. While Cuba was completely closing in on itself to absorb the global disruption, he composed five superb musical pieces, which he created for Banlieues Bleues with his faithful trio and a distinguished guest, also from Cuba, the choreographer and dancer Judith Sanchez Ruiz. Recorded at the Salle Jacques-Brel (Pantin) on March 19, 2021, as part of the 38th Banlieues Bleues festival, Directed by Guillaume Dero

programme.title: Montreux Jazz Festival 2018 (Montreux Jazz Festival 2018), Miuziklas, Šveicarija, 2018
programme.desc: Joao Bosco Recorded on July 5, 2018, at Montreux Jazz Club, at Montreux Jazz Festival TV Director, Julian Nicole Kay

programme.title: Estival Jazz Lugano (Estival Jazz Lugano), Miuziklas, Šveicarija, 1985
programme.desc: Sun Ra Arkestra Jazz Estival Sun Ra (clavier) Recorded in 1985, Lugano, Swiss Tv director, Sandro Pedrazzetti

programme.title: Kinga Glyk – New Morning (Kinga Glyk au New Morning), Miuziklas, 2020
programme.desc: Kinga Glyk Kinga Glyk (basse, saxophone) Arek Grygo (Keyboard) Pawel Toraszewski (Keyboard) Yoran Vroom (Drums) Recorded at the New Morning on January 23, 2020 TV Director, Patrick Savey

programme.title: Laurent Coulondre Trio – Nancy Jazz Pulsations (Laurent Coulondre Trio at Nancy Jazz Pulsations), 2015
programme.desc: Laurent Coulondre Trio at Nancy Jazz Pulsations 2015 Laurent Coulondre, piano, organ Rémi Bouyssière, bass, double bass Martin Wangermée, drums Laurent Coulondre belongs to a generation of young musicians who take jazz into unexplored territory. With a sharp sense of rhythm and harmony, he plays the piano and the organ with consummate ease and shows, at his young age, breathtaking musicality, technique and flair. Laurent Coulondre has defined the new concept of the "reversible trio", and a new sound identity. Alternating betweed the classical trio – piano, double bass and drums – and another form comprising organ, 6-string bass and drums, his music is innovative and challenging, without ever losing touch with its audience. Recorded on October 8th 2015, Poirel hall, Nancy Jazz Pulsations TV director, Sylvain Pierrel

programme.title: Intermezzo (Intermezzo)
programme.desc: Musical interludes on Mezzo TV: a channel dedicated to bringing you the best performances from opera, classical, dance and jazz. Intermezzo is a chance to see some of the world's most renowned conductors and musicians performing beautiful pieces.

programme.title: Brahms: String Quartet No.1, String Quintet No.2 (Brahms: String Quartet No.1, String Quintet No.2), Miuziklas, 2018
programme.desc: Strada Quartet, Adrien Boisseau (viola) Johannes Brahms (1833 – 1897) String Quartet No. 1 in C minor, op. 51 String Quintet No. 2 in G major, op. 111 Recorded June 10, 2018 at the Bouffes du Nord Theater, Paris Directed by Marc Wieviorka and Guillaume L'Hôte
